mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.time_of_entry AS "timeOfEntry", a.alipay_trade_number AS "alipayTradeNumber", a.alipay_serial_number AS "alipaySerialNumber", a.merchant_order_number AS "merchantOrderNumber", a.account_type AS "accountType", a.income AS "income", a.expenditure AS "expenditure", a.account_balance AS "accountBalance", a.service_charge AS "serviceCharge", a.channel_of_payment AS "channelOfPayment", a.contract_products AS "contractProducts", a.reciprocal_account AS "reciprocalAccount", a.reciprocal_name AS "reciprocalName", a.bank_order_number AS "bankOrderNumber", a.trade_name AS "tradeName", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.import_date AS "importDate"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fx_alipay_accounting( id, time_of_entry, alipay_trade_number, alipay_serial_number, merchant_order_number, account_type, income, expenditure, account_balance, service_charge, channel_of_payment, contract_products, reciprocal_account, reciprocal_name, bank_order_number, trade_name, remarks, import_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{timeOfEntry}, #{alipayTradeNumber}, #{alipaySerialNumber}, #{merchantOrderNumber}, #{accountType}, #{income}, #{expenditure}, #{accountBalance}, #{serviceCharge}, #{channelOfPayment}, #{contractProducts}, #{reciprocalAccount}, #{reciprocalName}, #{bankOrderNumber}, #{tradeName}, #{remarks}, #{importDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE fx_alipay_accounting SET time_of_entry = #{timeOfEntry}, alipay_trade_number = #{alipayTradeNumber}, alipay_serial_number = #{alipaySerialNumber}, merchant_order_number = #{merchantOrderNumber}, account_type = #{accountType}, income = #{income}, expenditure = #{expenditure}, account_balance = #{accountBalance}, service_charge = #{serviceCharge}, channel_of_payment = #{channelOfPayment}, contract_products = #{contractProducts}, reciprocal_account = #{reciprocalAccount}, reciprocal_name = #{reciprocalName}, bank_order_number = #{bankOrderNumber}, trade_name = #{tradeName}, remarks = #{remarks}, import_date = #{importDate} WHERE id = #{id}
